inclusion.criterion: One episode of documented stable clinical VT without any reversible causes
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Protruding LV thrombus on pre-ablation echocardiogram
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Acute myocardial infarction within the preceding 1 months
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Valvular heart disease or mechanical heart valve precluding access to the left ventricle
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Cardiac surgery involving cardiotomy (not CABG) within the past 2 months
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has history of CAD, prior MI, and VT without reversible causes. However, patient is currently experiencing unstable arrhythmias and may have contraindications to heparin.
